An apologie concerning perfection being a fundamentall answer and reply upon Esaiah Stiefel his exposition of four texts of the Holy Scripture written in the year 1622 ... / by Jacob Behme, also called Teutonicus philosophus ; Englished by John Sparrow. Vom Irrthum der Secten Esaiae Stiefels und Ezechiel Meths. English Böhme, Jakob, 1575-1624. Sparrow, John, 1615-1665?
[2], 156 p.
Printed by M.S. for Giles Calvert ..., London : 1661.
Translation of: Vom Irrthum der Secten Esaiae Stiefels und Ezechiel Meths. Fifth title in: The remainder of books. London, 1662. Reproduction of original in Yale University Library. Entry cancelled for B3395 in Wing (2nd ed.)
